casebody.data:
Mary L. Day, Respondent v. Joseph A. Jameson, et al., Appellants. Decided January 3, 1888. Appeal from judgment entered on verdict for plaintiff from order denying motion for new trial. Henry A. Root, for appellants. Daniel P. Hay, for respondent.

Before Sedgwick, Ch. J., and Freedman, J.

Per Curiam.

Judgment and order affirmed, with costs.
